title: Why is Eminem the fastest rapper of all time? - Quora

response.answer_text: Eminem isn’t the fastest rapper of all time. he falls into the decently fast category including Joyner Lucas,Krizz Kaliko... Next up are the choppers like Splyt Second, Twisted Insane, Tech N9ne, Busta Rhymes and several others. If you want the fastest rappers then look at Interchopper,Crucified,Rebel XD,Don Xperto,Outsider,El Chojin,The Jackal and 2–3 more. Crrucified is the fastest rapper hitting 28 syllables per second in his song Power Up. Crucified remains safely untouched in the English rapper category while Outsider,Don Xperto and El Chojin are a bit trickier and can’t qualify for the fastest rapper in the world because they don’t speak English
Nope ! there are many others as well. Rebel XD is the fastest rapper according to Guinness world records. Twista, Busta Rhymes & Tech N9ne are some of the best fast rappers 🌷
